English 09, Part 1

Unit Test Reattempts

Return to Course

You have already used all your eligible reattempts.

Use the Practice Final to prepare for the Final, and it will help you identify lessons in the course that you might need to review. Good luck with your Final Exam.

Student   :   Lisa Jones             Number of Reattempts Remaining   :    2


If you would like to improve your grade in this course BEFORE taking the Final Exam, you can reattempt up to two unit tests in this course. Review your grade book and determine where you think you could improve your grade. We recommend that you then revisit the lessons and quizzes in the units so you are well prepared. You cannot use your two reattempts on the same unit test.

Important - Once you take the Final Exam, the course is OVER, and any opportunity to improve your grade is closed.
